name: Quickchat AI
headline: Conversation Design platform to build Al Assistants tailored to yourâ¦
description: Quickchat AI empowers companies to build their own Multilingual AI Assistants powered by generative AI models such as GPT. Thanks to our powerful integrations and API they can add the power of conversational AI to any website, product, app, game or smart device. Backed by Y Combinator and other notable investors.

founders.name: Piotr Grudzien, Founder/CEO
founders.description: Co-Founder & CTO at Quickchat AI. Previously: Applied Scientist at Microsoft, Data Scientist at Featurespace.

# Platform to build reliable AI Agents
Customize your own ChatGPT that speaks and acts exactly how you wanted. Use it for customer support, shopping assistance, and much more.
[Book a demo](https://quickchat.ai/</book-a-demo>)[Try for free](https://quickchat.ai/<https:/app.quickchat.ai/register>)
Trusted by 1000+ companies, big and small:
![Company logo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64ec8b493c1dce82781f3313/6512ea6053a6e289336db95a_logo-customer-12.webp)
![Company logo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64ec8b493c1dce82781f3313/6571b7292c36caf897cc869a_miss-group.webp)
![Company logo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64ec8b493c1dce82781f3313/6512ea60d55191dd067d8375_logo-customer-16.svg)
![Company logo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64ec8b493c1dce82781f3313/6512ea606ce635d6d4db4285_logo-customer-13.webp)
![Company logo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64ec8b493c1dce82781f3313/651d6b239025736056b05022_logo-customer-3-color.webp)
![Company logo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64ec8b493c1dce82781f3313/6512eb3b1d861f19bd7e3dcf_logo-customer-10.webp)
![Company logo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64ec8b493c1dce82781f3313/6512ea60820554758047a347_logo-customer-14.webp)
![Company logo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64ec8b493c1dce82781f3313/651d6b5327b7927acda62fde_bluecart-logo.svg)
![Company logo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64ec8b493c1dce82781f3313/651d6b2440cf05108282dbcf_logo-customer-8.svg)
![Company logo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64ec8b493c1dce82781f3313/651be7c45754a33d9bde5c82_pond-lehocky-new-logo.webp)
common use cases
## Solve real problems with AI
AI for Customer Support
### Relieve your Customer Support team, while staying in control
###### 100+ Languages
Select the languages you want your AI Agent to speak.
###### Automated Human Handoff
AI Agent will automatically hand over a conversation to your team when needed.
###### Easy imports to the Knowledge Base
Build your AI Knowledge Base with ease — import your data through URLs, PDFs, Intercom Articles or just paste the text into the interface.
[Try for free](https://quickchat.ai/<https:/app.quickchat.ai/register>)
![Dashboard mockup](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64ec8b493c1dce82781f3313/659e9dc4da965823e6ffb667_customer-support-chat-new.webp)
![Dashboard mockup](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64ec8b493c1dce82781f3313/659e9dc489f353d0327b5065_sales-chat-new.webp)
AI for sales / eCommerce
### Move your website visitors down the funnel
###### AI Professions
Running an e-commerce store? Customize to make it proactively give your visitors personalized product recommendations.
###### Smart Lead Generation
Automatically collect your leads' contact details. Integrate with your CRM to have everything in one place.
###### Conversation Analytics Dashboard
Stay informed about your Agent's performance, be up-to-date with everything that's happening, and conduct your own analyses.
[Try for free](https://quickchat.ai/<https:/app.quickchat.ai/register>)
CUSTOM AI SOLUTION
## Need more power?
We will get knee-deep in your use case and build a unique AI Agent tailored exactly to your business. 
###### Custom AI Actions
AI Agent connects with your tools and systems as specified.
###### Custom AI Personality
Let it speak your brand voice.
###### Custom AI Profession
Make your AI Agent work toward the exact goals.
###### Custom Integrations
Put AI in your everyday tools.
[Try for free](https://quickchat.ai/<https:/app.quickchat.ai/register>)
![Dashboard mockup](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64ec8b493c1dce82781f3313/651ad6dc6c6ed99c3dd66f79_Quickchat%20Product%20Mobile.webp)
other features
## Customize your AI Agent with our robust features
#### Human Handoff
AI Agent will automatically hand over a conversation with a summary to your Teammates when needed.
[Read more](https://quickchat.ai/<https:/docs.quickchat.ai/diving-deeper/handoff>)
#### AI Professions
Customer Support Representative, Shopping Agent or Field Expert? Make the AI work towards your exact goals.
[Read more](https://quickchat.ai/<https:/docs.quickchat.ai/diving-deeper/ai-settings>)
#### Custom Translations
Pick from 100+ languages. Specify what particular translations you want the Agent to use.
[Read more](https://quickchat.ai/<https:/docs.quickchat.ai/diving-deeper/languages#custom-translations>)
#### Reply Length
Control the length of your AI Agent's responses during a conversation.
[Read more](https://quickchat.ai/<https:/docs.quickchat.ai/diving-deeper/reply-settings>)
#### Creativity Level
Decide if AI should improvise or strictly follow the provided Knowledge Base.
[Read more](https://quickchat.ai/<https:/docs.quickchat.ai/diving-deeper/ai-settings>)
#### Links Priority
Set how often to include links in a chat. Direct users to product pages, documents or any URL you choose.
[Read more](https://quickchat.ai/<https:/docs.quickchat.ai/diving-deeper/reply-settings>)
integrations
## Bring AI to your users' favorite spaces
Put Quickchat AI in your everyday tools. Use it within interfaces you already know.
![Integration icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64ec8b493c1dce82781f3313/64eca10d07998d22c2599f85_intercom%20logo.svg)![Integration icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64ec8b493c1dce82781f3313/658d84ca0d2d711d72db4613_zendesk.svg)![Integration icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64ec8b493c1dce82781f3313/65904a6c3fcec21648d7e525_Hubspot-logo.svg)![Integration icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64ec8b493c1dce82781f3313/658d7fd552d5ee59e37c5ebf_slack.svg)![Integration icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64ec8b493c1dce82781f3313/65904b6c015470c887a93d60_Drupal.svg)![Integration icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64ec8b493c1dce82781f3313/65904b6ce7844e205dc3fdfd_Messenger.svg)![Integration icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64ec8b493c1dce82781f3313/65904b6c79ac1d8d582aa65a_Telegram.svg)![Integration icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64ec8b493c1dce82781f3313/658d84ca0d2d711d72db4619_whatsapp.svg)![Integration icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64ec8b493c1dce82781f3313/658d84ca0d2d711d72db4617_discord.svg)![Integration icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64ec8b493c1dce82781f3313/65904b6c7ab093299d26b090_API.svg)
[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64ec8b493c1dce82781f3313/66d1cfb76dddd37d8454aa68_Polly.png)](https://quickchat.ai/<#>)
###### Quickchat AI has enabled each member of our team to be the best version of themselves. It gives our team the opportunity to do more creative tasks, which ultimately makes our company better.
Polly Barnfield
CEO, Maybe Tech
[![Testimonial logo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64ec8b493c1dce82781f3313/66d073b66a1fb028ace004ef_Maybe_Master_logo_black.png)](https://quickchat.ai/<https:/studyonline.ca/>)
[Read case study](https://quickchat.ai/<https:/www.quickchat.ai/customers/maybe-tech>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64ec8b493c1dce82781f3313/65d4a21c78b9e88bfde18743_home-echannel.webp)
###### We've had 2,000+ interactions with the Assistant with a user satisfaction rate of 100%. Quickchat AI had everything we needed: ease of building the Knowledge Base, user-friendly interface, multilingual abilities, and responsive customer support.
Michael La Riviere
Enterprise Web Architect
[![Testimonial logo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64ec8b493c1dce82781f3313/654b994a3f47506fffae1ced_CN-CN%20logo.png)](https://quickchat.ai/<https:/studyonline.ca/>)
[Read case study](https://quickchat.ai/</case-studies/contact-north-case-study>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64ec8b493c1dce82781f3313/65d4a10778b9e88bfde0e387_thomas-giordano-managing-partner-bryan-reilly-chief-financial-officer.webp)
###### Quickchat AI has revolutionized the way we work, saving us immense amounts of time and effort. It has become such an integral part of our team that we can't imagine life without it.
Richard Bandoy
Business Process Manager
[![Testimonial logo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64ec8b493c1dce82781f3313/6512902926b00595f5570a39_pond-lehocky-giordano-logos-idrbi8sJ7h%20\(1\).webp)](https://quickchat.ai/<https:/www.pondlehocky.com/>)
Quickchat ai in numbers
## Battle-tested, business-ready technology
Since 2020, we’ve been developing conversational AI Agents powered by Large Language Models. One thing has become clear — if businesses are to put AI front-and-center, they need detailed design and tight control over AI solutions.
### +4 years
in the field of Generative AI. We know how to do it right
### +7 000
AI Agents created for various use cases using our technology
### +10 million
messages replied by Al Agents created using Quickchat AI
### ∞
research on cutting-edge LLMs: GPT, Cohere, Anthropic
### Succeed in the new world redefined by AI. Don't get left behind.
‍**7-day free trial · No credit card required**
**‍** Start with a 7-day free trial to build and customize your AI Agent. Custom conversational AI solutions available.
[Start building for free](https://quickchat.ai/<https:/app.quickchat.ai/register>)[Book a demo](https://quickchat.ai/</book-a-demo>)
[![Quickchat AI logo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64ec8b493c1dce82781f3313/65257d354976b49df59b6ccd_quickchat_ai_logo_white.svg)](https://quickchat.ai/<https:/www.quickchat.ai>)

generated_description:
### Quickchat AI: Revolutionizing Conversational AI

**Overview**  
Quickchat AI, founded in 2018 and based in Warsaw, Poland, is a cutting-edge platform that allows businesses to create their own multilingual AI assistants powered by advanced generative models like GPT. They enable companies to enhance their customer interactions across websites, applications, games, and other digital ecosystems. Quickchat AI gained their initial momentum by participating in Y Combinator’s Batch S18 and has since attracted notable investors.

**Mission Statement**  
Quickchat AI aims to simplify and elevate the process of conversation design, empowering companies to create AI assistants that are tailored to specific business needs. 

**The Product**  
The platform allows users to customize AI assistants that can serve various functions, from customer support to sales optimization. They boast an extensive feature set, including:

- **Multilingual Capabilities:** Supports over 100 languages to cater to a global audience.
- **Customizable AI Agents:** Businesses can tailor the functionality, personality, and integrations of their AI to reflect their brand and operational needs.
- **Integration Friendly:** Seamless integration with existing tools like Slack, HubSpot, Zendesk, and others makes it easy for businesses to incorporate AI directly into their workflows.

**Target Use Cases**  
Quickchat AI focuses on several key areas:
- **Customer Support:** Automate responses, manage inquiries in various languages, and ensure smooth human handoff when necessary.
- **Sales and E-Commerce:** Assist customers by providing product recommendations and lead generation through conversational analytics.
- **Research:** Utilize AI for interviewing and data collection, making research processes more efficient.

**Team and Growth**  
With a small but dedicated team of 14 employees, Quickchat AI is growing rapidly and has created over 7,000 AI agents that handle more than 10 million interactions. Their technology is not only battle-tested but is continuously refined through ongoing research on leading AI models.

**Pricing and Accessibility**  
They offer a 7-day free trial with no credit card required, allowing businesses to experiment with building their customized AI agents before making a financial commitment. Current promotional offers also provide discounts for the initial months of service.

**Testimonials and Trust**  
Trusted by over 1,000 companies globally, Quickchat AI has received positive feedback for its user-friendly interface and effective functionality. Customers report significant improvements in user satisfaction and operational efficiency after integrating their AI technologies.

In summary, Quickchat AI is at the forefront of the conversational AI landscape. If you're looking to leverage the power of AI to enhance your customer interactions and operational efficiency, Quickchat AI provides the tools you need to succeed in a rapidly evolving digital world. 

For more information, check out their website at [quickchat.ai](https://quickchat.ai).
